00031 INT32       giTimerIntervals[ NUMTIMERS ] =
00032 { 
00033             5,                            // Tactical Overhead
00034             20,                           // NEXTSCROLL
00035             200,                    // Start Scroll
00036             200,                    // Animate tiles
00037             1000,                   // FPS Counter
00038             80,                           // PATH FIND COUNTER
00039             150,                    // CURSOR TIMER
00040             250,                    // RIGHT CLICK FOR MENU
00041             300,                    // LEFT
00042             30,                           // SLIDING TEXT
00043             200,                    // TARGET REFINE TIMER
00044             150,                          // CURSOR/AP FLASH
00045             60,                           // FADE MERCS OUT
00046             160,                    // PANEL SLIDE

00055             400,                          // RADARMAP BLINK AND OVERHEAD MAP BLINK SHOUDL BE THE SAME
00056             400,
00057             10,                           // Music Overhead
00058             100,                    // Rubber band start delay
00059 };

00105 void CALLBACK TimeProc( UINT uID,   UINT uMsg, DWORD dwUser, DWORD dw1, DWORD dw2   )
00106 {
00107       static BOOLEAN fInFunction = FALSE;
00108       //SOLDIERTYPE           *pSoldier;
00109 
00110       if ( !fInFunction )
00111       {
00112             fInFunction = TRUE;
00113 
00114             guiBaseJA2NoPauseClock += BASETIMESLICE;
00115 
00116 
00117             if ( !gfPauseClock )
00118             {
00119                   guiBaseJA2Clock += BASETIMESLICE;
00120 
00121                   for ( gCNT = 0; gCNT < NUMTIMERS; gCNT++ )
00122                   {
00123                         UPDATECOUNTER( gCNT );
00124                   }
00125 
00126                   // Update some specialized countdown timers...
00127                   UPDATETIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidQuote );
00128                   UPDATETIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidDiveStarted );
00129                   UPDATETIMECOUNTER( giTimerAirRaidUpdate );
00130                   UPDATETIMECOUNTER( giTimerTeamTurnUpdate );
00131 
00132                   if ( gpCustomizableTimerCallback )
00133                   {
00134                         UPDATETIMECOUNTER( giTimerCustomizable );
00135                   }
00136 
00137 #ifndef BOUNDS_CHECKER
00138 
00139       // If mapscreen...
00140       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
00141       {
00142         // IN Mapscreen, loop through player's team.....
00143                     for ( gCNT = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; gCNT <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; gCNT++ )
00144                     {
00145                           gPSOLDIER = MercPtrs[ gCNT ];
00146                               UPDATETIMECOUNTER( gPSOLDIER->PortraitFlashCounter );
00147                               UPDATETIMECOUNTER( gPSOLDIER->PanelAnimateCounter );
00148         }
00149       }
00150       else
00151       {
00152                     // Set update flags for soldiers
00153                     ////////////////////////////            
00154                     for ( gCNT = 0; gCNT < guiNumMercSlots; gCNT++ )
00155                     {
00156                           gPSOLDIER = MercSlots[ gCNT ];
00157 
00158                           if ( gPSOLDIER != NULL )
00159                           {
00160                                 UPDATETIMECOUNTER( gPSOLDIER->UpdateCounter );
00161                                 UPDATETIMECOUNTER( gPSOLDIER->DamageCounter );
00162                                 UPDATETIMECOUNTER( gPSOLDIER->ReloadCounter );
00163                                 UPDATETIMECOUNTER( gPSOLDIER->FlashSelCounter );
00164                                 UPDATETIMECOUNTER( gPSOLDIER->BlinkSelCounter );
00165                                 UPDATETIMECOUNTER( gPSOLDIER->PortraitFlashCounter );
00166                                 UPDATETIMECOUNTER( gPSOLDIER->AICounter );
00167                                 UPDATETIMECOUNTER( gPSOLDIER->FadeCounter );
00168                                 UPDATETIMECOUNTER( gPSOLDIER->NextTileCounter );
00169                                 UPDATETIMECOUNTER( gPSOLDIER->PanelAnimateCounter );
00170                           }
00171                     }
00172       }
00173 #endif
00174             }
00175 
00176 
00177             fInFunction = FALSE;
00178       }
00179 
00180 }

00183 
00184 BOOLEAN InitializeJA2Clock(void)
00185 {
00186 
00187 #ifdef CALLBACKTIMER
00188 
00189 
00190       MMRESULT    mmResult;
00191       TIMECAPS    tc;
00192       INT32             cnt;
00193 
00194       // Init timer delays
00195       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUMTIMERS; cnt++ )
00196       {
00197             giTimerCounters[ cnt ] = giTimerIntervals[ cnt ];
00198       }
00199 
00200 
00201       // First get timer resolutions
00202       mmResult = timeGetDevCaps( &tc, sizeof( tc ) );
00203 
00204       if ( mmResult != TIMERR_NOERROR )
00205       {
00206              DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Could not get timer properties");
00207       }
00208 
00209       // Set timer at lowest resolution. Could use middle of lowest/highest, we'll see how this performs first
00210       gTimerID = timeSetEvent( BASETIMESLICE, BASETIMESLICE, TimeProc, (DWORD)0, TIME_PERIODIC );
00211  
00212       if ( !gTimerID )
00213       {
00214              DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Could not create timer callback");
00215       }
00216 
00217 #endif
00218 
00219   return TRUE;
00220 }
00221 
00222 void    ShutdownJA2Clock(void)
00223 {
00224   // Make sure we kill the timer
00225 #ifdef CALLBACKTIMER
00226 
00227   timeKillEvent( gTimerID );
00228 
00229 #endif
00230 
00231 }
00232 
00233 UINT32 InitializeJA2TimerCallback( UINT32 uiDelay, LPTIMECALLBACK TimerProc, UINT32 uiUser )
00234 {
00235       MMRESULT    mmResult;
00236       TIMECAPS    tc;
00237       MMRESULT    TimerID;
00238 
00239 
00240       // First get timer resolutions
00241       mmResult = timeGetDevCaps( &tc, sizeof( tc ) );
00242 
00243       if ( mmResult != TIMERR_NOERROR )
00244       {
00245              DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Could not get timer properties");
00246       }
00247 
00248       // Set timer at lowest resolution. Could use middle of lowest/highest, we'll see how this performs first
00249       TimerID = timeSetEvent( (UINT)uiDelay, (UINT)uiDelay, TimerProc, (DWORD)uiUser, TIME_PERIODIC );
00250  
00251       if ( !TimerID )
00252       {
00253              DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Could not create timer callback");
00254       }
00255 
00256   return ( (UINT32)TimerID );
00257 }
00258 
00259 
00260 void RemoveJA2TimerCallback( UINT32 uiTimer )
00261 {
00262       timeKillEvent( uiTimer );
00263 }
00264 
00265 
00266 UINT32 InitializeJA2TimerID( UINT32 uiDelay, UINT32 uiCallbackID, UINT32 uiUser )
00267 {
00268       switch( uiCallbackID )
00269       {
00270             case ITEM_LOCATOR_CALLBACK:
00271 
00272                   return( InitializeJA2TimerCallback( uiDelay, FlashItem, uiUser ) );
00273                   break;
00274             
00275       }
00276 
00277       // invalid callback id
00278       Assert( FALSE );
00279       return( 0 );
00280 }

00296 
00297 void SetCustomizableTimerCallbackAndDelay( INT32 iDelay, CUSTOMIZABLE_TIMER_CALLBACK pCallback, BOOLEAN fReplace )
00298 {
00299       if ( gpCustomizableTimerCallback )
00300       {
00301             if ( !fReplace )
00302             {
00303                   // replace callback but call the current callback first
00304                   gpCustomizableTimerCallback();
00305             }
00306       }
00307 
00308       RESETTIMECOUNTER( giTimerCustomizable, iDelay );
00309       gpCustomizableTimerCallback = pCallback;
00310 }
00311 
00312 void CheckCustomizableTimer( void )
00313 {
00314       if ( gpCustomizableTimerCallback )
00315       {
00316             if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( giTimerCustomizable, 0 ) )
00317             {
00318                   // set the callback to a temp variable so we can reset the global variable
00319                   // before calling the callback, so that if the callback sets up another 
00320                   // instance of the timer, we don't reset it afterwards
00321                   CUSTOMIZABLE_TIMER_CALLBACK pTempCallback;
00322 
00323                   pTempCallback = gpCustomizableTimerCallback;
00324                   gpCustomizableTimerCallback = NULL;
00325                   pTempCallback();
00326             }
00327       }
00328 }
00329

00332 void ResetJA2ClockGlobalTimers( void )
00333 {
00334       UINT32 uiCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
00335 
00336 
00337       guiCompressionStringBaseTime = uiCurrentTime;
00338       giFlashHighlightedItemBaseTime = uiCurrentTime;
00339       giCompatibleItemBaseTime = uiCurrentTime;
00340   giAnimateRouteBaseTime = uiCurrentTime;
00341       giPotHeliPathBaseTime = uiCurrentTime; 
00342       giClickHeliIconBaseTime = uiCurrentTime;
00343       giExitToTactBaseTime = uiCurrentTime;
00344       guiSectorLocatorBaseTime = uiCurrentTime;
00345 
00346       giCommonGlowBaseTime = uiCurrentTime;
00347       giFlashAssignBaseTime = uiCurrentTime;
00348       giFlashContractBaseTime = uiCurrentTime;
00349       guiFlashCursorBaseTime = uiCurrentTime;
00350       giPotCharPathBaseTime = uiCurrentTime; 
00351 }
